channel.title: About on Fueled by Cofee
channel.description: Recent content in About on Fueled by Cofee

item.title: How we ran a Unix-like OS (Xv6), on our home-built CPU with our home-built C compiler
item.description: It’s been two years since I started working as a software engineer in Tokyo. Sometimes I tell my colleagues about a student project I did in my junior year of university, and it was so well received that I’m going to blog about it. 1 Now, let me ask you a question. Have you ever designed your own ISA, built a processor of that ISA on FPGA, and built a compiler for it?
